WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
Great project. Was looking for an alternative to the WCF Test Client because it doesn't allow me to set multiple values of a Flags enum parameter.
 
Storm accepts it but gives me the following error when I try to invoke:
 
System.Reflection.TargetParameterCountException: Het aantal parameters komt niet overeen.
   bij System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.Invoke(Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, Binder binder, Object[] parameters, CultureInfo culture, Boolean skipVisibilityChecks)
   bij System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.Invoke(Object obj, BindingFlags invokeAttr, Binder binder, Object[] parameters, CultureInfo culture)
   bij Storm.UI.Forms.FormMainOps.clo@651.Invoke(Object[] methodParams@41)
   bij <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_2.Invoke(DoWorkEventArgs dArgs)
   bij <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_1.Invoke(Object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)
   bij System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.WorkerThreadStart(Object argument)
 
It might have to do with nullable types being used.
 
Regards, Jacco
